snippet: CORRY--Emily McKnight, 85, of Bronxville, May 21. Beloved wife of John A. Corry and mother of Anne Corry. Alumna of Smith College. Lifelong lover of opera, travel and cooking. Services at Bronxville Reformed Church, June 9, 4pm. Contributions to Chautauqua Foundation, Box 46, Chautauqua, NY 14722. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CORRY--Emily McKnight, 85, of Bronxville, May 21. Beloved wife of John A. Corry and mother of Anne Corry. Alumna of Smith College. Lifelong lover of opera, travel and cooking. Services at Bronxville Reformed Church, June 9, 4pm. Contributions to Chautauqua Foundation, Box 46, Chautauqua, NY 14722. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CORRY, EMILY MCKNIGHT
